text: No Mercy (2002) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It took place on October 20, 2002, at the Alltel Arena in North Little Rock, Arkansas. It was the fifth No Mercy event held by WWE. ==Results== ===Tournament bracket=== The tournament was held between October 3 and October 20, 2002. title: No Mercy (2002)
